name: WaveView
desc: Programmed an audio visualizer from scratch using C++ and OpenGL. It takes a .wav file as an argument, opens a graphical display window and plays the sound back while visualizing it in real-time.

name: Doppelg√§nger
desc: Built and programmed a 'smart' guitar pedal with a graphical interface. The pedal uses neural networks to detect and approximate effects from other guitar pedals to copy them. When connected to a guitar, the device can apply any copied guitar pedal's effects to the analog sound.

name: Mining World
desc: Programmed a massively multiplayer online video game where players defeat monsters, collect valuable ore, craft items, and explore alien planets. This was done predominantly in lua, and the project went on to garner tens of thousands of players.

name: CATBooks
desc: Built a book-sharing website where users can post books and add reviews/comments. Calculates ratings, stores user data using MySQL, and features top performing books
